channel.title: Gelatos on Edmund Goodman
channel.description: Recent content in Gelatos on Edmund Goodman

item.title: Jack's Gelato Menus
item.description:
Bene’t Street (Thursday, 05/12/2024)

  • Mince Pie
  • Brandy Butter (+£1)
  • Dark Chocolate & Orange (vegan)
  • Flourish Farm Pumpkin
  • Rose Stracciatella
  • Vanilla
  • Yuzu
  • Bronte Pistachio (+£1)
  • Honeycomb
  • King’s College Lavender
  • Girton Apple Sorbet (vegan)
  • Cashew, Raspberry Ripple (vegan)
  • Coconut & Ube (vegan)
  • Strawberries & Cream

All menu information is property of Jack’s Gelato. This page is updated daily at 10:20am – see my blog post for why I made it.
